content: . Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â   Â  Â  Â  Â  Â   Â  Â  Â   Joseon is engaged in humanitarian efforts to expand its global impact.As the first sovereign cyber nation, Joseon is introducing the legal concept of a personal interest corporation (or â€œDenizenâ€), decoupling identity and reputation from a physical person.Joseon is the first legally recognized cyber nation-state.   More details on the website:  https://joseon.com/ Â  â— Bounty Campaign Round 1 Dates: May 15 - May 29  lasts for 2 weeks.â— Tokens will be distributed to participants within 6 weeks after the end of the Bounty Campaign.â— Daily stakes! Do tasks every day and make reports every 3 days !â— Tokens will be distributed to participants within 6 weeks after the end of the Bounty Campaign in the Coinsbit registration Email: ( https://coinsbit.io )â— Join JSM on social media:- Telegram - Twitter- Facebook- Instagram- Discordâ— You will receive stakes for performing certain actions, after the end of the bounty campaign, the stakes will be converted into tokens, according to the formula (total number of tokens/total number of stakes)*number of your stakes.â— Please read the terms and conditions carefully. For non-compliance, even minor, you will not receive stakes or will be excluded from the bounty program.â— Use of multi-accounts, spam, bots and other is strictly forbidden, all attempts will be banned.â— Bounty managers reserve the right to change the conditions of the bounty campaign. â— Make reports in a separate post every 3 days. DO NOT QUOTE YOUR OLD REPORTğŸ™!â— Please, read the terms carefully. For non-compliance with requirements, you will not get stakes or be excluded from the bounty program. Follow all updates in this thread and Telegram chats: Joseon Mun Bounty,  Joseon Mun Chat , Aladdin Centerâ— Â Format for proof of authentication post:Code: Proof of authentication:- Coinsbit registration Email: ( https://coinsbit.io )- ETH (erc 20) wallet address:- Telegram Username:- Campaigns applied for:* Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.Bounty campaign reward pool: 1 400 000 JSM Â tokens will be distributed through this bounty campaign. * Bounty Aladdin Center has escrowed and guarantees the reward distribution of this bounty. Â Rewards dislocation:â— Video: Â 20%â— Article: Â 10%â— Twitter : 20%â— Telegram: 15%â— Facebook: 10%â— Instagram: 5%â— Discord: 10%â— Reserve fund - 10%Rewards:  â— Excellent: 4 stakes (High quality video and >4000 subscribers)â— High: 3 stakes (Good quality video and >2000 subscribers )â— Good: 2 stake (Average quality video and >1000 subscribers)â— Average: 1 stake (Average quality video and >400 subscribers)Rules: Â â— Join JSM on social media:- Telegram - Twitter- Facebook- Instagram- Discordâ— Each participant can send: Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â - YouTube - 2 videos ( No more than 1 video a week )Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â - Tiktok - 2 videos ( No more than 1 video a week )â— Participant's account should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the video campaign and have at least 300 subscribers.â— The video description must include 70+ words of original text about the company Joseon Mun ($JSM)â— You must have at least (minimum) 100 views under your video to get the stakesâ— Please note, if the video has 0 views it will be rated at 0 stakes!â— Content topics:Â Â - Â Information can be used from social networks: https://joseon.com/ Â https://joseon.cloud/JoseonWhitepaper.pdf and use hashtags: #JoseonMun â— Only original video content will be accepted. Copy from the project website, YouTube channels or from others' work will be rejected.â— Face cam video will be highly recommended and considered.â— High engagements but poor quality video will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and quality.â— Videos should never be removed. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.â— All videos need to have a link to the Proof of Authentication, project's website, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel or any other social media.â— Please provide enough details of the bounty hunter at the end of the video to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!â— By joining this program, all participants accept that the project's team can use all these videos as marketing materials.â— Article and Video submission form will be closed 3 days before the end of the bounty.â— Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  Joseon Mun Bounty, Aladdin CenterHow to join: Â 1. Â Join JSM on social media:- Telegram - Twitter- Facebook- Instagram- Discord3. Write a good video about JSM  project4. Post it on your website, Tiktok, YouTube5. Submit it here:  * Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.Rewards:â— Excellent: 4 stakesâ— High: 3 stakesâ— Good: 2 stakesâ— Average: 1 stakeRules:â— Each participant can write 2 original Â article only ( No more than 1 per week )â— Articles should be quality and unique with a minimum of 500 words.â— Views and comments at least 10 likes/comments/upvotes or 100 claps would be taken note of.â— Participant's forum accounts should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the article campaign.â— Articles should be published on blogs recommended by us: Steemit, Reddit, BitcoinTalk, Medium and LinkedIn and must be publicly accessible.Other high ranked blogs may be accepted.â— In the description of a Article, you have to write 70+ words of original text about the company https://joseon.com/ Â â— Content topics:Information can be used from social networks https://joseon.com/ Â https://joseon.cloud/JoseonWhitepaper.pdf and use hashtags: #JoseonMun It would be great to have videos about how Joseon can help people launch their businesses and crypto projects because Joseon has the most relaxed laws and is a pro crypto jurisdiction!â— Only quality and original content will be accepted. Articles should never be removed. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.â— Published Articles must include at least 2 images of the project, link to the Proof of Authentication, project's website, Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel or any other social media.â— Please provide enough details of the writer at the end of the article to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!â— By joining this program, all participants accept that the project's team can use all these articles as marketing materialsâ— Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  Joseon Mun Bounty, Aladdin CenterHow to join:1. Â Join JSM on social media:- Telegram - Twitter- Facebook- Instagram- Discord2. Write a good article about https://joseon.com/ project3. Post it on your website, Medium, LinkedIn, Steemit, Reddit, BitcoinTalk, etc.:4. Submit it here:  * Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.Rewards:â— Have more than 300 followers: 1 stake per one tweet or retweet /week â— Have more than 1000 followers: 2 stake per one tweet or retweet /week â— Have more than 3000 followers: 3 stake per one tweet or retweet /weekâ— Have more than 5000 followers: 4 stake per one tweet or retweet /weekâ— Have more than 10000 followers: 5 stake per one tweet or retweet /weekRules:â— Must have at least 300 followers and make privacy settings open for your page.â— Follow and like the official Twitter accountâ— Make 1 post every day. Use information from official social networks. â— Make 1 repost every day. Like a post when you make a repost. Use information from official social networks. â— DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT ! â— Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked and deletedâ— Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  Joseon Mun Bounty, Aladdin Centerâ— Please, post all the links to your work in this thread at the end of every week as a new post. Do not quote or edit your previous week report.How to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2. Make reports every 3 days using this format:Â Code:â— Twitter Report â—- Day: XX - XX- Twitter Profile:- Retweet Link #1....- Tweet Link#1....- Retweet Link #2....- Tweet Link#2....- Retweet Link #3....- Tweet Link#3....Rewards:â— 1 comment = 1 stakes (10 stakes/week)â— 20 stakes once for wearing a â€œYour Name | Joseon Munâ€ + LOGO.Rules:â— Join Â - Telegramâ— Write at least 2 constructive messages per day in top exchangeâ€™s telegram groups (Example: Binance, Kucoin, Gate.io, MEXC etc). Posting messages on other groups wonâ€™t be counted.â— DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT !â— Write comments in a crypto related group, mentioning the Joseon Munâ— Continue the comment of the previous person. Your comment should flow into the dialogue and continue the personâ€™s thought. â— It is forbidden to make meaningless and unconscious comments, spam. Comments like: Hi!, Hello!, Good project - will not be counted. Don't spam all comments in a row, donâ€™t write Â silly phrases! Spam and low quality will not be counted. â— Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  Joseon Mun Bounty, Aladdin Centerâ— Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked and deleted.Name: Your name | Joseon Mun Ambassador.Avatar: How to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2. Make reports Â every 3 days Â using this format::Code: â— Telegram Report â—- Day XX - XX- Username link: (Example: https://t.me/username)- Telegram comments:- Comment Link #1:- Comment Link #2:- Comment Link #3:- Comment Link #4:- Comment Link #5:.- Comment Link #6:* Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.Rewards:â— 300 - 1000 Friends + Followers: 1 stake, per one post or repost or commentâ— 1001 - 3000 Friends + Followers: 2 stakes, per one post or repost or commentâ— 3001 - 6000 Friends + Followers: 3 stakes, per one post or repost or commentâ— 6001 - 12000 Friends + Followers: 4 stakes per one post or repost or commentâ— 12001+ Followers: 5 stakes per one post or repost or commentRules:â— Must have at least 300 friends and make privacy settings open for your page.â— Follow and like the official Facebook account â— Make 1 posts and 1 repost per day.â— Like a post when you make a share.â— Post must contain text 70+ charactersâ— Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked anddeleted.â— Please, post all the links to your work in this thread every 3 days as a new post. Do not quote or edit your previous report.â— Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  Joseon Mun Bounty, Aladdin CenterHow to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.
